title: Vaccine Detox Blend | Green Elephant
author: Green Elephant
description: After much global research I have come up with a blend of herbal and homeopathics specifically designed to counteract the effects of the current Jab. This blend is recommended if you have adverse health symptoms after being jabbed.
cleaned_text: Product Information The four herbs, Dandelion (liver detoxer) Cilantro (heavy metal remover) Wormwood and Thuja a renown homeopathic remedy for vaccinosis. This product hasn't been tested for long on humans for its effectiveness but we will post feedback as soon as it is available. We highly recommend it if you are suffering adverse effects. I can't guarantee a cure but theoretically it should help your body recover from the trauma. And it is definately safe. (not from the ministry of truth). If you choose to purchase this product while it is at its introductory price, we ask you to provide us with some feedback on how you find it helps your symptoms please. |Variation||Weight||Dimensions|
